pkgmetadata.longdescription: Crypto-cpp-py=============A python packaged `crypto-cpp <https://github.com/software-mansion-labs/crypto-cpp/tree/master>`_ library, that can be used for hashing and signing messages in starknet.Dependencies------------- ecdsa,- sympy,- cmake [optional, for building package from sdist; can be installed with `pip install crypto-cpp-py[build]`]
